Sentencas: The Ti and Mn replaced complex perovskites, Ln(0.5)Sr(0.5)Ti(0.5)Mn(0.5)O(3 +/- d) (Ln: La, Nd and Sm), were reported as potential anode materials for high temperature-operating solid oxide fuel cells (HT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical conductivity characteristics of Ln0.5Sr0.5Ti0.5Mn0.5O3 ± d (Ln: La, Nd and Sm) complex perovskites as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For the present research study, synthesis, crystallographic, thermal and electrical conductivity properties of Ln(0.5)Sr(0.5)Ti(0.5)Mn(0.5)O(3 +/- d) a complex perovskites were investigated using X-ray diffraction (XRD), Rietveld method, thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) and electrical conductivity to apply these oxide materials for the HT-SOFC anode materials.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical conductivity characteristics of Ln0.5Sr0.5Ti0.5Mn0.5O3 ± d (Ln: La, Nd and Sm) complex perovskites as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: XRD results showed that Ln(0.5)Sr(0.5)Ti(0.5)Mn(0.5)O(3 +/- d) oxide systems synthesized as single phases did not react with 8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia (8YSZ) and 10 mol% Gd-doped cerium oxide (CGO91) up to 1500 degrees C and did not decompose under dry 3.9% hydrogen at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical conductivity characteristics of Ln0.5Sr0.5Ti0.5Mn0.5O3 ± d (Ln: La, Nd and Sm) complex perovskites as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The crystal structures of Ln(0.5)Sr(0.5)Ti(0.5)Mn(0.5)O(3 +/- d) (LSTM), Nd0.5Sr0.5Ti0.5Mn0.5O3 +/- d (NSTM) and Sm0.5Sr0.5Ti0.5Mn0.5O3 +/- d (SSTM) showed orthorhombic symmetry with the space group Pbnm and SSTM showed a more distorted structure.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical conductivity characteristics of Ln0.5Sr0.5Ti0.5Mn0.5O3 ± d (Ln: La, Nd and Sm) complex perovskites as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) proved weight gains in these three sample occurred under oxidizing conditions and weight loss under reducing conditions.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical conductivity characteristics of Ln0.5Sr0.5Ti0.5Mn0.5O3 ± d (Ln: La, Nd and Sm) complex perovskites as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity values of NSTM were higher than those of LSTM and SSTM under oxidizing and reducing conditions.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical conductivity characteristics of Ln0.5Sr0.5Ti0.5Mn0.5O3 ± d (Ln: La, Nd and Sm) complex perovskites as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cell
